aws_db_event_subscription.description: Provides a DB event subscription resource.

name.description: The name of the DB event subscription. By default generated by Terraform.

name_prefix.description: The name of the DB event subscription. Conflicts with `name`.

sns_topic.description: The SNS topic to send events to.

source_ids.description: A list of identifiers of the event sources for which events will be returned. If not specified, then all sources are included in the response. If specified, a source_type must also be specified.

source_type.description: The type of source that will be generating the events. Valid options are `db-instance`, `db-security-group`, `db-parameter-group`, `db-snapshot`, `db-cluster` or `db-cluster-snapshot`. If not set, all sources will be subscribed to.

event_categories.description: A list of event categories for a SourceType that you want to subscribe to. See http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/USER_Events.html or run `aws rds describe-event-categories`.

enabled.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable the subscription. Defaults to true.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.
